title: Stop It, Zots!
subtle: Fantasy (fiction), 132 words, Level F (Grade 1), Lexile 280L, Fiction Series
description: Abby (a human girl) and Zots (an alien) are best friends. Zots wants to play with Abby, but she needs to finish her homework first. Stop It, Zots! tells the amusing story of how Zots decides to pass the time while waiting for Abby. Detailed illustrations and a repetitive text structure support early emergent readers. The book can also be used to teach students how to analyze characters as well as connect to prior knowledge to better understand the story.
meta: board, bored, bounces, pretend, quietly, rocks out
